resources.string: You must enable location permissions in order to use this feature. Please enable location access and try again.
You must log in successfully before you can add points to the database.
Error: could not retrieve the last location of the device.
No location data was found. You may need to turn on Location in your device settings.
Connection error: make sure server is running and device has a network connection.
Network error: make sure your device has an active network connection.
Authentication error: try entering your username and password again.
Timeout error: server took too long to respond.
Server error: oops, something went wrong on the server.
